description: React component 'ExportPDF' that provides functionality to download a draft as a text file, generate a simple PDF client-side, and optionally save data to a Supabase database.

methods.name: saveToSupabase
methods.description: Saves the current draft and metadata to the 'sows' table in Supabase, updating the status accordingly.

methods.name: downloadText
methods.description: Creates a text file from the draft content and triggers download.

methods.name: downloadPDF
methods.description: Generates a minimal PDF client-side from draft content and triggers download.
